get.description: Gets all job collections under specified subscription.

200.description: The job collections have been successfully returned.

get.description: Gets all job collections under specified resource group.

200.description: The job collections have been successfully returned.
The job collection has been successfully returned.

put.description: Provisions a new job collection or updates an existing job collection.

200.description: The job collection has been successfully updated.

201.description: The job collection has been successfully created.

200.description: The job collection has been successfully patched.
The job collection has been successfully deleted.

202.description: Accepted and the delete job collection operation will complete asynchronously.

post.description: Enables all of the jobs in the job collection.

200.description: All of the jobs in the job collection have been successfully enabled.

202.description: Accepted and the enable job collection operation will complete asynchronously.

post.description: Disables all of the jobs in the job collection.

200.description: All of the jobs in the job collection have been successfully disabled.

202.description: Accepted and the disable job collection operation will complete asynchronously.

200.description: The job has been successfully returned.

put.description: Provisions a new job or updates an existing job.

200.description: The job has been successfully updated.

201.description: The job has been successfully created.

200.description: The job has been successfully patched.
The job has been successfully deleted.
The job has been successfully run.

get.description: Lists all jobs under the specified job collection.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: The number of jobs to request, in the of range [1..100].

parameters.name: $skip
parameters.description: The (0-based) index of the job history list from which to begin requesting entries.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: The filter to apply on the job state.

200.description: The job has been successfully returned.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: the number of job history to request, in the of range [1..100].

parameters.name: $skip
parameters.description: The (0-based) index of the job history list from which to begin requesting entries.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: The filter to apply on the job state.

200.description: The job histories have been successfully returned.

nextLink.description: Gets or sets the URL to get the next set of job collections.

value.description: Gets or sets all jobs under job collection.

nextLink.description: Gets or sets the URL to get the next set of jobs.

value.description: Gets or sets the job histories under job.

nextLink.description: Gets or sets the URL to get the next set of job histories.

id.description: Gets the job collection resource identifier.

type.description: Gets the job collection resource type.

name.description: Gets or sets the job collection resource name.

location.description: Gets or sets the storage account location.

properties.description: Gets or sets the job collection properties.

quota.description: Gets or sets the job collection quota.

maxJobCount.description: Gets or set the maximum job count.

maxJobOccurrence.description: Gets or sets the maximum job occurrence.

maxRecurrence.description: Gets or set the maximum recurrence.

properties.description: Gets or sets the job properties.

startTime.description: Gets or sets the job start time.

action.description: Gets or sets the job action.

recurrence.description: Gets or sets the job recurrence.

state.description: Gets or set the job state.

type.description: Gets the job history resource type.

properties.description: Gets or sets the job history properties.

startTime.description: Gets the start time for this job.

endTime.description: Gets the end time for this job.

expectedExecutionTime.description: Gets the expected execution time for this job.

actionName.description: Gets the job history action name.

message.description: Gets the message for the job history.

retryCount.description: Gets the retry count for job.

repeatCount.description: Gets the repeat count for the job.

type.description: Gets or sets the job action type.

request.description: Gets or sets the http requests.

queueMessage.description: Gets or sets the storage queue message.

serviceBusQueueMessage.description: Gets or sets the service bus queue message.

serviceBusTopicMessage.description: Gets or sets the service bus topic message.

retryPolicy.description: Gets or sets the retry policy.

errorAction.description: Gets or sets the error action.

type.description: Gets or sets the job error action type.

request.description: Gets or sets the http requests.

queueMessage.description: Gets or sets the storage queue message.

serviceBusQueueMessage.description: Gets or sets the service bus queue message.

serviceBusTopicMessage.description: Gets or sets the service bus topic message.

retryPolicy.description: Gets or sets the retry policy.

authentication.description: Gets or sets the http authentication.

method.description: Gets or sets the method of the request.

body.description: Gets or sets the request body.

certificateThumbprint.description: Gets or sets the certificate thumbprint.

certificateExpirationDate.description: Gets or sets the certificate expiration date.

certificateSubjectName.description: Gets or sets the certificate subject name.

clientId.description: Gets or sets the client identifier.

type.description: Gets or sets the http authentication type.

storageAccount.description: Gets or sets the storage account name.

queueName.description: Gets or sets the queue name.

sasToken.description: Gets or sets the SAS key.

queueName.description: Gets or sets the queue name.

topicPath.description: Gets or sets the topic path.

brokeredMessageProperties.description: Gets or sets the brokered message properties.

customMessageProperties.description: Gets or sets the custom message properties.

transportType.description: Gets or sets the transport type.

sasKey.description: Gets or sets the SAS key.

sasKeyName.description: Gets or sets the SAS key name.

type.description: Gets or sets the authentication type.

contentType.description: Gets or sets the content type.

correlationId.description: Gets or sets the correlation id.

forcePersistence.description: Gets or sets the force persistence.

messageId.description: Gets or sets the message id.

partitionKey.description: Gets or sets the partition key.

replyTo.description: Gets or sets the reply to.

replyToSessionId.description: Gets or sets the reply to session id.

scheduledEnqueueTimeUtc.description: Gets or sets the scheduled enqueue time UTC.

sessionId.description: Gets or sets the session id.

timeToLive.description: Gets or sets the time to live.

viaPartitionKey.description: Gets or sets the via partition key.

retryType.description: Gets or sets the retry strategy to be used.

retryInterval.description: Gets or sets the retry interval between retries.

retryCount.description: Gets or sets the number of times a retry should be attempted.

frequency.description: Gets or sets the frequency of recurrence (second, minute, hour, day, week, month).

interval.description: Gets or sets the interval between retries.

frequency.description: Gets or sets the frequency of recurrence (second, minute, hour, day, week, month).

interval.description: Gets or sets the interval between retries.

count.description: Gets or sets the maximum number of times that the job should run.

endTime.description: Gets or sets the time at which the job will complete.

RecurrenceFrequency.description: Gets or sets the frequency of recurrence (minute, hour, day, week, month).

weekDays.description: Gets or sets the days of the week that the job should execute on.

hours.description: Gets or sets the hours of the day that the job should execute at.

minutes.description: Gets or sets the minutes of the hour that the job should execute at.

monthDays.description: Gets or sets the days of the month that the job should execute on. Must be between 1 and 31.

monthlyOccurrences.description: Gets or sets the occurrences of days within a month.

day.description: Gets or sets the day. Must be one of monday, tuesday, wednesday, thursday, friday, saturday, sunday.

Occurrence.description: Gets or sets the occurrence. Must be between -5 and 5.

state.description: Gets or sets the job state.

JobState.description: Gets or set the job state.

status.description: Gets or sets the job execution status.

executionCount.description: Gets the number of times this job has executed.

failureCount.description: Gets the number of times this job has failed.

faultedCount.description: Gets the number of faulted occurrences (occurrences that were retried and failed as many times as the retry policy states).

lastExecutionTime.description: Gets the time the last occurrence executed in ISO-8601 format.  Could be empty if job has not run yet.

nextExecutionTime.description: Gets the time of the next occurrence in ISO-8601 format. Could be empty if the job is completed.
